markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nagaji Spell Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=3988) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 49</row>

**Prerequisites**
at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat

</column>

---

You've learned more [naga](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=75) magic. During your daily preparations, choose [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148). You can cast the chosen spell as a 1st-level occult innate spell once that day.

<title level="2">Nagaji Spell Mysteries leads to...</title>
[Nagaji Spell Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=3996)
name: Nagaji Spell Mysteries
prerequisite: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat
prerequisite_markdown: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat
